article.headline: Illinois State 53, Creighton 50
article.story: NORMAL, Ill. (AP) -- Neil Plank scored 17 points and Dana Ford added 14 as Illinois State came from behind to defeat Creighton 53-50 on Saturday. Plank also grabbed six rebounds and dished out three assists for Illinois State (6-4, 1-1). Ford had four steals and two blocked shots. Anthony Tolliver had 15 points to lead Creighton (7-3, 1-1). Nate Funk added 13 points, including three 3-pointers, for the Bluejays. Creighton led 28-23 at the half. But Illinois State shot 50 percent from the field and hit four of nine 3-point attempts in the second half. The Redbirds scored 21 points off of 19 Creighton turnovers.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
